property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, succeed at an Intelligence or Arcane 10 check; otherwise, you are dealt 1d6 Cold damage. If undefeated, each character at this location is dealt 1d4 Cold damage and is moved to a random other location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, discard a blessing. If defeated, choose a type of non-loot boon and draw a random card of that type from the box. If undefeated, draw the scourge Curse of Fevered Dreams from the box.

property.name: Attr1
property.value:
The Hungry Fog is immune to the Acid and Electricity traits.
Before you act, you may succeed at a Dexterity or Stealth 10 check to evade the Hungry Fog.
If undefeated, bury the top card of your deck and put the Hungry Fog on top of your location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, encounter it. If undefeated, each character at your location must summon and encounter the henchman Blightwing. Then banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, succeed at a Dexterity or Disable 11 check or each character at this location is dealt 2 Poison damage. Display this card next to its location. While displayed, at the start of your turn, succeed at a Wisdom Perception 10 check to banish this barrier; otherwise, you are dealt 2 Poison damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each character at your location must attempt a Dexterity or Acrobatics 12 or Disable 9 check. Any character that fails the check must bury her hand. If your check succeeds, you may explore your location. After you act, shuffle this card into a random other open location; the Rolling Sphere is defeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, succeed at a Dexterity or Disable 12 or Perception 8 check to evade this barrier, otherwise encounter it. Display this card next to your deck; it is defeated. At the start of each turn, recharge your hand and draw 1 less than the number of cards you recharged. At the end of your turn, you may succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 8 check to banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 6 check or recharge your hand and reset your hand. Then you are dealt 1 Mental damage that may not be reduced. While you act, you may bury any number of allies. For each ally buried, add 4 to your check to defeat. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, succeed at a Stealth 7 check; otherwise, summon and encounter the henchman Forgotten Pharaoh Cultist. All damage dealt by the Lamia Sisters is Cold damage. If defeated, you may draw a random non-Basic Item from the box. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter the Sand Kraken, all characters at this location must succed at the check to defeat the Sand Kraken. If any character fails this check, the Sand Kraken is undefeated. Any character that fails this check shuffles his character token into this location. If undefeated, the Sand Kraken does not escape; display it next to this location instead. While displayed, once all character tokens in this location have been revealed, the Sand Kraken is defeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, summon and encounter the henchman Thriae Dancer. If defeated, display this card. While displayed, when you discard cards as damage, shuffle this card into a random open location deck then reduce the number of cards you must discard by 1. NO HENCHMAN CLOSE

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, succeed at a Stealth 8 check or the difficulty of the combat check to defeat is increased by 4. If defeated, draw an item from the box, then you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from. If undefeated, move to a random other location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, if you have a card that has the Curse trait displayed, banish a card that has the Curse trait; otherwise, draw the scourge Curse of Fevered Dreams from the box. Damage dealt by the Theletos is Mental damage that may not be reduced. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Thriae Dancer is immune to the Poison trait. All damage dealt by the Thriae Dancer is Poison damage. If every character at this location has the henchman Stolen Larvae displayed, you may evade Thriae Dancer. If defeated, you may examine the top card of any location deck. NO HENCHMAN CLOSE

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Thriae Soldier is immune to the Poison trait. All damage dealt by the Thriae Soldier is Poison damage. If your check to defeat exceeds 17, you are dealt 1 Poison damage. NO HENCHMAN CLOSE

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you have the henchman Stolen Larvae displayed, you may evade Xerippe. Before you act, each character at your location that does not have Stolen Larvae displayed summons and encounters the henchman Thriae Soldier Xerippe is immune to the Poison trait. All damage dealt by Xerippe is Poison damage. NO HENCHMAN CLOSE

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Burning Child is immune to the Mental, Poison and Fire traits. If the check to defeat the Burning Child has the Cold trait, add 1d8. If defeated with a combat check, shuffle it into a random other open location. If defeated with a Charisma check, you are dealt 1d4 Fire damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, shuffle this card into a random open location. If the check to defeat has the Cold trait, add 1d8.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Guecubu is immune to the Mental, Electricity, and Poison traits. After you act, draw a random scourge from the box.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Mummified Sphinx is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If the check to defeat has the Fire trait, add 1d8. Before you act, recharge your hand, reset your hand, and bury a card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If your check to defeat does not have the Attack or Ranged trait, the difficulty is increased by 4. Damage dealt by the Rukh is Acid damage. If undefeated, move to a random location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, succeed at a Dexterity or Acrobatics 7 check or when you are dealt damage, discard cards from the top of your deck instead of your hand; this damage may not be reduced.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Thunder Lizard is immune to the Electricity trait. Before you act, the Thunder Lizard deals 1d4 Electricity damage to each character at your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, if no trophy stack has 3 or more cards, the Camel Race Finish Line is evaded and you may explore again. When defeated, choose 1 of the trophy stacks that has the highest number of cards and add the loot Muminofrah's Favor to it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When this card is discarded, determine the highest number of cards in any trophy stack. If the Cultist Charioteers' trophy stack has that number of cards, put its top card on top of any trophy stack that has the fewest cards; otherwise, choose a character's trophy stack that has that number of cards and put its top card on top of the Cultist Charioteers' trophy stack. Then banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: While displayed, when you encounter a card that has a check to acquire or defeat, each character rolls 1d8+1d6. Add the number of characters to the highest result and add 5 if the check is a combat check. This is the Cultist Charioteers' result. When you resolve the encounter, if the Cultist Charioteers' result exceeds your highest check to acquire or defeat, put the card on top of a trophy stack next to this card. Otherwise, if you acquired or defeated the card, put it on top of a trophy stack next to your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, succeed at a Wisdom Divine 8 check; otherwise, draw the scourge Curse of Fevered Dreams from the box.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Jamirah is immune to the Mental trait. Before you act, succeed at a Strength or Melee 8 check or Jamirah is evaded. If the check to defeat did not exceed 21, each character at this location may draw a card..

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, each character at your location must succeed at a Dexterity or Acrobatics 6 check; otherwise, that character is dealt 1d4 Electricity damage. After you act, each character at this location is dealt 1 Acid damage. If defeated, search this location for the Sand Kraken. If it is not at this location, Khabekh-Shu is undefeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, each character at your location that does not have the henchman Stolen Larvae displayed summons and encounters the henchman Thriae Solider. Before you act, each character at your location that does not have the henchman Stolen Larvae displayed summons and encounters the henchman Thriae Soldier. Zizzira is immune to the Poison trait. All damage dealt by Zizzira is Poison damage. If defeated, you may search this location for a Stolen Larvae and draw it, then banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to a check against a barrier or a check to acquire a boon. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter this card, you may reveal a blessing that has the Abadar trait to acquire this card. Bury this card to recharge any number of blessings that has the Abadar trait from your discard pile. Discard this card to explore your location. Add 1d8 to any combat checks during this exploration.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1 die to your Intelligence or Knowledge check. If you fail the check, bury this card instead and discard a card from your hand. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1d10 to your Stealth non-combat check. Discard this card to examine the top card of your location deck, then you may explore. If you encounter a monster during this exploration, you may add 1d6 and the Acid and Poison traits to your checks to defeat it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you fail the check to acquire, you are dealt 1 Combat damage. Recharge this card to add 1d8 to your Knowledge or Survival check. Bury this card to move any number of characters at your location to another location. You may then explore your location. This power cannot be used during an encounter.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to exchange a card in your hand with a card of the same type in your discard pile. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce Acid, Combat, Electricity, or Fire damage dealt to you by 2 or add 2 to your Charisma or Diplomacy non-combat check. Banish this card to reduce Acid, Combat, Electricity, or Fire damage dealt to you to 0. If proficient with light armors, bury this card instead. If proficient with light armors, recharge this card to draw an ally from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you played a weapon that has the 2-Handed trait on this check, you may not play this card. Reveal this card to reduce Acid, Combat, or Fire damage dealt to you by 2. You may play another armor on this check. When playing a weapon, you may discard this card to add 1d4 and the Slashing trait to the check.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat, Cold, Fire, or Poison damage dealt to you by 3. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if proficient with heavy armors, bury it instead. If proficient with heavy armors, recharge this card to add 1d8 to your check that invokes the Undead trait.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Clothing Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce Acid, Cold, Electricity, or Poison damage dealt to you by 3. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0. If proficient with light armors, bury this card instead. If proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce Acid, Cold, Electricity, or Fire damage dealt to you by 3. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0. If proficient with light armors, bury this card instead. If proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die and the Acid trait to any check. Discard this card to add 2 dice to any Intelligence check or check that invokes the Acid or Construct traits. Discard this card to explore your location. After you play this card, if it matches the top card of the blessings discard pile, recharge a random card that has the Magic trait from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reroll 1 die on a check by a character at your location. On your turn, you may give this card to a character at another location; you may additionally give him a weapon, an armor, or an item. Then that character must recharge this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1d8 and the Poison trait to your combat check with a weapon. After the check, succeed at a Craft or Disable 10 check or bury the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add the Acid trait to your Melee check. You may play another item on this check. Recharge this card to add 1d8 to your check that invokes the Acid trait. You may play another item on this check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, you may reveal a blessing that has the Anubis trait to acquire this card. When a character at your location defeats a monster that has the Undead trait, recharge this card to draw a card from your discard pile or bury this card to shuffle 1d4+1 cards from your discard pile into your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you examine this card, you may reveal a blessing that has the Isis trait to acquire this card. Recharge this card to add 1 die to your Intelligence non-combat check or check that invokes the Acid trait. Recharge this card to add the Acid trait to your check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1d4 plus the scenario's adventure deck number to your check that invokes the Undead trait. If the top card of the blessings discard pile has the Pharasma trait, add 1d4 plus twice the adventure deck number instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Banish this card and bury a card to add 1d12 to a check against a monster by a character at your location. Add an additional 1d6 if the monster has the Undead trait, or 2d6 if the monster has the Mummy trait. If you would not defeat it, evade it instead; otherwise, the monster is defeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card to put a spell from your hand faceup on this card. You may bury this card to put the spell into your hand. When you would bury this card for its power, you may succeed at a Craft 12 check to recharge it instead of burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card and recharge a spell to examine the top 2 cards of your location deck. If a card has the Elemental or Undead trait, you may encounter it. Otherwise, put the cards back on top in any order. At the begining of your turn, reveal this card to examine the top card of your deck. You may return the examined card to the top or bottom of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, bury this card to roll 4d6. After playing this card, succeed at an Arcane 8 check to recharge this card instead of burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to the scenario. While displayed, any character may recharge a card to add 1d12 to his Diplomacy check. If the scenario's adventure deck number is 4 or higher, any character may remove this card from the game to draw a random ally that has the current scenario's adventure deck number from the box.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to succeed at your check to temporarily close a location. When you fail a check to close a location, bury this card to reroll the dice; take the new result.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to examine the top card of your location. If it has the Undead trait, you may explore your location. Bury this card to banish any number of Curses displayed next to the deck of a character at your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to explore your location. If the top card of the blessings discard pile has the Basic or Fire trait, bury this card to add 2d6 to your combat check; add an additional 2d6 if the bane has the Undead trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: At the start of your turn, reveal this card to shuffle any number of cards into your deck, then reset your hand. Discard this card to explore your location. You may add 1d12 to your checks against banes that have the Sphinx trait or invoke the Cold trait during this exploration.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card. While displayed, you may be dealt 1 Combat damage to add 1d8 and the Acid trait to a combat check by a character at your location. You may play another spell on your check. At the end of your turn, if you do not have the Divine skill, banish this card; otherwise, you may attempt a Divine 13 check. If you succeed, recharge this card; if you fail, discard it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, display this card next to your deck to use your Arcane skill + 3d6. While displayed, you may use the result of this check for any combat check you attempt at this location. At the end of the turn, if you do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card; otherwise, discard it, or you may succeed at an Arcane 12 check to recharge it instead.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, you may discard this card to use your Arcane skill + 4d6 and add the Acid, Cold, Electricity, Fire, or Poison trait. You are dealt the highest number you rolled on a d6 rolled as damage of the same type. After playing this card, if you do not have the Arcane skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane 12 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard to add 1d10 to a check by a character at your location to defeat a monster that invokes the Acid, Cold, Electricity, Elemental, Fire, or Poison trait. Discard this card to add 3 dice to a check that invokes the Acid, Cold, Electricity, Fire, or Poison trait by a character at your location to acquire an ally. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane or Divine 13 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to evade a non-villain, non-henchmen monster that does not have the Incorporeal trait. Discard this card to add 2 dice to a check to defeat a barrier that has the Obstacle or Trap trait. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane or Divine 12 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card. While displayed, if you examine a bane that has the Trigger trait, add 1 die to your checks against it, and ignore any abilities that increase its check to defeat. At the end of your turn, discard this card. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 11 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to use your Arcane or Divine skill + 3d6. If you fail this check against a monster, you may evade it. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane or Divine 13 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d4+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d4 then search your deck for a weapon that has the Knife trait and put it in your hand. When playing another weapon, you may discard this card to add 2d4 to your combat check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 2d4+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d4. If the bane has the Undead trait, add another 1d8. If not proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee skill + 1d6 +2. If proficient with weapons, you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6+1 and the Electricity trait. If proficient with weapons, discard this card to ignore a non-villain monster's power that happens before you act.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d6+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6 and the Fire trait. Reveal this card and discard a spell to reduce the difficulty of a combat check by 1d6+1.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to roll your Strength or Melee skill + 1d6+2; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d6+2. You may use the result on any additional combat checks against the same bane. Reveal this card and discard a spell to evade a monster or add 1d8 to your Diplomacy check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 6 Barrier 4 Weapon 2 Spell 2 Armor 2 Item 2 Ally 2 Blessing 2

property.name: Attr2
property.value: During your encounter, if you are dealt damage that is not reduced by at least 1, banish the top card of your trophy stack.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: This location may not be closed.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 4 Barrier 1 Weapon 1 Spell 1 Armor 0 Item 1 Ally 0 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: All monsters have the Undead trait, are immune to Mental and Poison, and all damage dealt by them is Cold damage.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Summon and defeat the henchman Theletos.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, draw a random spell from the box.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Every space within Chisisek's tomb glitters with lavish rewards, none greater than the wondrous architecture itself. Gilded murals of the architects' greatest accomplishments line the walls, with details of massive elemental obelisks and flying pyramids recreated in painstaking detail. The Sky Pharaoh's servant has been well bribed for his blood silence.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 1 Weapon 0 Spell 3 Armor 0 Item 0 Ally 2 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: If you fail to acquire a boon, shuffle it into this deck.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at an Intelligence or Knowledge 6 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, draw a random spell from the box.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A fortress of knowledge, the Great Library holds sage wisdom stretching back to the birth of writing itself. A cadre of librarians guards it zealously, armed with keen memories and swords. Trespassers meet their end by a librarian's hand or wither away in the uncountable stacks of scrolls that twist through tunnels deep into the earth.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 0 Barrier 0 Weapon 0 Spell 1 Armor 0 Item 1 Ally 5 Blessing 2

property.name: Attr2
property.value: If you fail to acquire an ally, you are dealt 1d4 Poison damage.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at Charisma or Diplomacy 9 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may recharge a card from your discard pile.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Muminofrah holds court upon a mountain of satin pillos amid gold-embroidered drapes and oiled servants. Her barge is docked ostentatiously in view, a reminder that her wealth and power stands well apart from the common folk of Tephu.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may recharge a card from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 0 Barrier 0 Weapon 2 Spell 2 Armor 2 Item 1 Ally 1 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, summon and encounter the henchman Thriae Dancer.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Summon and defeat the henchman Thriae Soldier.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may recharge a weapon from your discard pile.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: With a hexagonal rhythm that is at once pleasing and disorienting, the walls of the thriae hive buzz with the dance of a thousand workers intent on an alien purpose. Here, all actions serve the thriae seer's unknowable desires.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may recharge a weapon from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 1 Barrier 3 Weapon 1 Spell 2 Armor 0 Item 1 Ally 0 Blessing 1

property.name: Attr2
property.value: When you defeat a bane, you may succeed at a Knowledge or Perception 7 check to explore your location.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Summon and defeat a random barrier.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, you may succeed at a Knowledge or Perception 7 check to recharge a card from your discard pile.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Gaining access to this archive of dangerous secrets of Osirion's ancient past is only the first trial. Built with an ingenious viciousness that only the dispassionate librarians of Tephu could muster, the many traps within the Vault of Hidden Wisdom keep its knowledge safe from destruction and from escape. The greatest danger is wishing to know more.

property.name: Attr1
property.value:
Display this card. While displayed, after you reset your hand, recharge your hand, then draw 1d4+1 cards.
You may only have 1 copy of this card displayed.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Chasing the legend of the Forgotten Pharaoh leads to Tephu, the jewel of the River Sphinx. Gain the favor you need to access the Great Library. The memories of those who served the Pharaohs of old are well-guarded and kept far from the living. Where the names of the dead wield power, no one is forgotten by accident. In the uncharted wastes beyond Tephu lies the last memory of why the Pharaoh was Forgotten.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Muminofrah's Amusement Quiet, Please Sting Operation Devouring Dunes In Search of Chisisek

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Each character chooses a role card and gains a power feat.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: The scourge die is 1d6+1. When you are dealt Poison damage, if that damage is not reduced by at least 1, suffer the scourge Curse of Poisoning.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A powerful wizard in the service of the Forgotten Pharaoh and his charmed hieracosphinx pursue you. Fleeing across the Dunes of Death, you hope the sinister cultists will lose your trail. The dunes rumble and shift with the sound of something colossal moving the hills. It waits for fresh prey. Perhaps one problem can take care of the other.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Shifting Dunes Sulfur Pits Windswept Chasm Howling Sands Hot Springs Scorched Ruins Earthworks Thornscrub

property.name: Attr1
property.value: After you move, you are dealt 1 Electricity damage. When you would banish the henchman Sand Kraken, shuffle it into or put it on the bottom of any open location deck.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Sand Kraken Akitar Forgotten Pharaoh Cultists

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Scarab Brooch Trader: Agymah

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Chisisek, great architect of the Forgotten Pharaoh, lies entombed in a remote desert valley. Tetisurah, the powerful sphinx that guards the valley, is held captive by a spell. As lamias scour the tombs, the stone guardians at the tomb's doors stand firm. There is a chance yet to find the ancient architect before Jamirah, the lamia matriarch, hunts you down.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Chisisek's Tomb Great Library of Tephu Tarworks Shifting Dunes Thriae Hive Scorched Ruins Pleasure Barge Windswept Chasm

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you create the blessings deck, replace 6 blessings with the henchmen Forgotten Pharaoh Cultists. When a Forgotten Pharaoh Cultist is discarded from the blessings deck, summon and encounter it; if defeated, display the Forgotten Pharaoh Cultist next to the scenario. You may add 2 to your check to defeat the henchman Warrior Dolls for each Forgotten Pharaoh Cultist displayed.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Lamia Sisters Warrior Dolls

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Only power can pry open some doors long held shut. The best way to get passage into the deepest records at the Great Library of Tephu is to impress the city's most obstreperous noblewoman, Muminofrah. Her whim this week? Win a camel race! The Cult of the Forgotten Pharaoh will do their best to embarass you before Muminofrah's gaze.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Camel Race

property.name: Attr1
property.value: After creating the blessings deck, shuffle 3 copies of the villain Cameltrops into it. Display the villain Cultist Charioteers next to the scenario. You win the scenario only when the loot Muminofrah's Favor is in a trophy stack.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Camel Race Finish Line

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gets the boons in the trophy stack next to her deck.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The great Library of Tephu has stood for more than a thousand years because curators like Deka An-Keret protect its records. Its vaults long disremembered by the living, clockwork guardians patrol uncounted miles of papyrus. If the name of the Forgotten Pharaoh is to be found, it will be here. Make yourself a whisper, as any disturbance will alert the curators.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Great Library of Tephu Pleasure Barge Vault of Hidden Wisdom Ruined Temple Dilapidated Plaza Glass Pavillion Mausoleum Warehouse

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If the result of your combat check is greater than 19, bury a random card then summon and encounter the henchman Voices of the Spire.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Deka An-Keret

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Theletos Tephu Librarians

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a card feat. Trader: Udjebet

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The Cult of the Forgotten Pharaoh has hopes of raising thriae colonies loyal to the Pharaoh. To this end, they have killed the queen of a colony deep in the Parched Dune Desert and stolen the royal larvae. Recover the stolen larvae for the thriae and impress their seer Zizzira, and you'll have resourceful allies who can guide you to the tombs you seek.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Dilapidated Plaza Thornscrub Thriae Hive Volcanic Vents Howling Sands Towering Obelisk Precious Mine Shifting Dunes

property.name: Attr1
property.value: After adding villains and henchmen, shuffle 1 henchman Stolen Larvae into each location deck. When you discard cards as damage, first choose Stolen Larvae if you have any; shuffle the Larvae into random open location decks instead of discarding them. You win the scenario only when all of the Stolen Larvae are in characters' hands. (You do not have to defeat and corner the villain.)

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Xerippe, Random Monsters

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a skill feat. Loot: Scarab of Mummy Defense

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Offers spells that have the Arcane trait. Cost: 3 boons.

property.name: Attr1
